full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
-------------------------------------------------------

**Tender Title:** TSPS - Four (4) Senior Psychologists for the Military Police

**Contract Number:** W6369-24-X013

**Publication Date:** January 24, 2024
**Closing Date:** February 19, 2024, 2:00 PM (EST)

The Department of National Defence (DND) requires Task-Based Professional Services (TSPS) for the provision of four (4) Senior Psychologists to conduct psychological screenings for high-risk employment positions in Close Protection (CP). This requirement is part of the E60ZT-18TSPS Supply Arrangement.

**Objective:**
The successful bidder will provide psychological screening services, including data interpretation, candidate interviews, and written summaries of findings. The psychologists must be able to assess candidates' psychological robustness to ensure they can undergo training and perform in high-risk CP roles.

**Service Requirements:**

* Provide psychological screenings for candidates entering high-risk employment positions in CP
* Conduct interviews and gather information from psychological tests
* Interpret data and provide written summaries of findings
* Ensure candidates meet the required psychological standards for high-risk employment

**Contractual Details:**

* Contract duration: approximately two (2) years, with three (3) one-year options for extension
* Estimated level of effort: 40 days per year
* Security requirement: Custom SRCL
* Minimum corporate security required: Protected B
* Minimum resource security required: Reliability Status

**Trade Agreements:**
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contact Information:**
For more information, please contact:

Rogelio Orsetti
rogelio.orsettipetrocelli@forces.gc.ca
(613) 715-0853

**Submission Instructions:**
Request for Proposal (RFP) documents will be sent directly to qualified Supply Arrangement Holders.
